page.title: 04COMMUNITY EVENTS IN FAIRFORD
page.content: In June l985 there was an important music festival to raise money for the rebuilding of the church organ. In conjunction with this there was a flower festival in the church and a wine party in Fairford House. An annual event that draws crowds to Fairford for a weekend each August is the{Traction Engine Rally. } These engines, which were once used on farms, come from all over the country. At the rally there are veteran cars, an old-fashioned fair, steam organs, side-shows and various craft stalls. There are smaller events happening throughout the year at Fairford. The Palmer Hall is used for jumble sales, parties, discos and roller skating. Discos are held at the Youth Club. Farmor's School and Fairford Primary School have annual fetes plus other attractions.
